paragraphs.title: Overview
paragraphs.text:
%md

This tutorial demonstrates how to use Flink do data exploration analytics via its.

* batch sql 
* udf (scala, python & hive) 
* Zeppelin's dynamic forms and builtin visualization

We use the bank data registered in another tutorial note. You can also use any existed hive table.

msg.data:
This tutorial demonstrates how to use Flink do data exploration analytics via its.

  • batch sql
  • udf (scala, python & hive)
  • Zeppelin’s dynamic forms and builtin visualization

We use the bank data registered in another tutorial note. You can also use any existed hive table.

paragraphs.title: Common group by
paragraphs.text:
%flink.bsql

select age, count(1) as aval
from bank 
where age < 30 
group by age 
order by age

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Textbox dynamic form
paragraphs.text:
%flink.bsql

select age, count(1) as val 
from bank 
where age < ${maxAge=30} 
group by age 
order by age

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Select dynamic form
paragraphs.text:
%flink.bsql

select age, count(1) as val 
from bank 
where marital='${marital=single,single|divorced|married}' 
group by age 
order by age

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Scala UDF
Python UDF
Use scala udf in sql
paragraphs.text:
%flink.bsql

select scala_upper(education), count(1) from bank group by education

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data:
EXPR$0	EXPR$1
PRIMARY	678
SECONDARY	2306
TERTIARY	1350
UNKNOWN	187

paragraphs.title: Use python udf in sql
paragraphs.text:
%flink.bsql

select python_upper(education) as edu, count(1) as c from bank group by education

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

edu	c
PRIMARY	678
SECONDARY	2306
TERTIARY	1350
UNKNOWN	187
